text: I have this crazy problem when I got json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0).  I reinstalled everything like 4 TIMES, and then it suddenly worked as in the video. I went for dinner and when I came back I get the same error as before. I changed absolutely NOTHING! Can anyone help me? I've gone through dozens of threads and the entire comment sections for all videos, nothing works for me.   I did the following the time it worked: conda create -n Zipline python=3.5 pip install tensorflow-gpu==2.0.0-beta1  pip install zipline zipline ingest -b quantopian-quandl   I copy-pasted the code and have SPY.csv in the right directory. I have tried with both panel = pd.Panel(data) and panel = pd.DataFrame(data['SPY'])   Big thanks

author: @Factorpad
text: Nice video Harrison. For your subscribers who want a background on portfolio optimization and constraints it may be worth looking at white papers provided by risk model providers that work with huge ($1B+) quant funds. Whether it be a fundamental-factor or economic macro factor APT model, firms like Barra, Northfield, Axioma, Wilshire have been integrating optimization with risk models for decades. They're expensive, but you may be able to improve your performance by incorporating nuances of optimization with constraints in Python. -Paul
